remarks: The probability of the union of a countable disjoint set of events is the sum of their probabilities.  (Third axiom of Kolmogorov) Here, the ` sum_ ` construct cannot be used as it can handle infinite indexing set only if they are subsets of ` ZZ ` , which is not the case here. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)
